SOLD BY MATTHEW RINGERI
CRANBOURNE EAST-HUNT CLUB: If you are looking to buy a great family home in a rare court location then 6 Chief Court needs to be seen to be appreciated!
Constructed by well known builders Porter Davis this complete package measures some 32sq underroof and it sits proudly on a massive app. 716m2 block!
With a functional, free flowing floor plan the property itself features 4 generous bedrooms plus an open study. There is internal access to the house and single door to the side of the house. The backyard has opportunity written all over it.
